title: Sometimes Like Butterflies
lyrics:
Well, I told you not to fall in love
I ain't the kind you can tie down
You went and did it anyway
As though I'd done you harm

Each time I went reachin' out

That's when you let go

Now don't try to pretend 

That you didn't know



If you want to love me

If you want to hold me

Come on baby, set me free

I got to be free



If you want to love me

If you want to hold me

Butterflies are meant to fly

I got to be free

Sometimes like butterflies

Oh, yeah, ooh, baby, baby, ahh, yeah



Well I told ya right from the beginning

I couldn't stay for too long - that I had to go

Now, it's not because it's in my heart

Baby, I don't love you

Just because I'm meant to be

I'm meant to be free



'Cause if you want to love me

If you want to hold me

Come on baby, set me free

I got to be free



'Cause if you want to love me

If you want to hold me

Butterflies are meant to fly

I got to be free

Sometimes like butterflies



No, it's not because it's in my heart

Oh, I don't love you

It's only that I'm meant to be

I'm meant to be free



'Cause if you want to love me

If you want to hold me, baby

Let me fly, fly, fly, fly

I got to be free



Oh, baby

Love me, love me, love me, baby

Let me fly, fly, fly

I got to be free



Set me free

Set me free

Set me free

Oh, baby, baby, baby, baby, baby



Oh, oh, baby

Love me, love me, love me, baby

Set me free

Oh, baby



If you want to love me

If you want to hold me

Come on baby, set me free

I got to be free, oh



'Cause if you want to love me

If you want to hold me

Butterflies are meant to fly

I got to be free



'Cause if you want to love me

If you want to hold me

Come on baby, set me free

I got to be free
